title: [1.7.3]传送带 Conveyor Belt Mod [V2.1]
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-8-13 14:04 编辑 

Hello Everyone! My name is Decman1717, And I am bringing you my first mod, Movers! 

Movers Move players, items and even falling sand!!!!! This mod is Modloader Compatible and edits a whopping..... ZERO BASE CLASSES! 


So, You probably thinking by now "Hes a Noob! He has like 30 posts! VIRUS!" Well, here is a little video i made:


The crafting Recipes are as follows:







Here is the download link for version 2.1!!!!!: http://www.box.net/s...ft278hbg7o4q4qj

New in Version 2.1: Bouncer: Bounces Items in the air!
And New Textures
NEEDS MODLOADER



http://www.box.net/s...fvzzc15j819cl05




PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE Give Feedback and Suggestions!!!!!!!

replies.txt_content: lz也不描述一下= =。。我连这mod是干嘛的都不知道

replies.txt_content: 就是輸送帶咩... 把那些輸送帶方塊連成一長條, 在這端放上東西, 它就會沿著輸送帶移動到另一端去...
